title: All migrants should take a loyalty oath pronto, or go back home
description: 'Any foreigner unwilling to swear his full allegiance to the U.S. should not be allowed to remain here'
content: While President Trump placed a moratorium on migration to the U.S. from Third World countries, Pope Leo was speaking against migration in Lebanon. These two leaders with very different backgrounds re… [+4953 chars]
